item.name: ecoulomb.method
item.desc: Type of screening used. **simple** for a constant dielectric constant, **distdep** for a distance-dependent screening. In the latter case screening length must be specified.

item.name: ecoulomb.epsilon
item.desc: Relative dielectric constant of the semiconductor.

item.name: ecoulomb.screening
item.desc: Screening length used in the distance-dependent screening.

item.name: ecoulomb.cutoff
item.desc: Cutoff in nm for coulomb interactions based on molecular centers of mass. If ommited, the whole box is taken.
